messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Diplomatic Corps

Cargo: The Spider Clan has sent us a mysterious gift. Can we ship it to you to see what's inside?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Cargo shuttle commandeered by CentCom.

The cargo shuttle should return in five minutes. Have some supply points for your trouble.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Telecomms Admin
messages.body: SO IT SEEMS TCOMMS IS FUCKED FOREVER

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our sophisticated probabilistic models, we believe that one of the station's animals/bots has developed security level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The head of personnel has been arrested, if anybody has information come to the bridge now

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Space-time anomalies detected on the station. There is no additional data.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The head of personnel has commit suicide while in a jail cell, he is not to be cloned, teh body will be destroyued shortly

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Shall we call the shuttle?

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The station is located in a zone full of space debris. We have a prototype shielding system you must deploy to reduce collision-related accidents. You can order the satellites and control systems at cargo.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Mmmmm  you have been so productive this shift we will go with a solid yes

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We have bluespaced parts for the new equipment to cargonia

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The body of the head of personnel has been thrown into space, thank you for everybodies coorporation on dealing with the syndicate agent

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Anyone willing to throw a party the station seems a bit to dead

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Anybody wanna get outta here yet?

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We bo on that ass blast usa, also, furries banned

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Vault.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Big doinks now legal

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Anyone wanna nuke station?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Space Station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.
